headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. Allowed value: "application/json"

parameters.name: advertiser_ids
parameters.description: IDs of the ad accounts in the Business Center that you want to disable. Max size =1. Important : If an account in the Business Center is disabled, the balance of the ad account will be transferred to the Business Center that the ad account belongs to.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: disabled_advertiser_ids
fields.description: IDs of the ad accounts that have been successfully disabled.

fields.name: failed_infos
fields.description: Information about the ad accounts that have not been successfully disabled. Key: The ID of the ad account ( advertiser_id ) that has not been successfully disabled. Value: The reason or reasons why the attempt to disable the ad account failed. Enum values: DELIVERING : The ad account has ads that are being delivered within 3 days. UNPAID_BILL : The ad account has unpaid bills. SUSPENDED : The ad account is being suspended. UNFINISHED_TRANSFER : The ad account has unfinished transfers. AUTOPAY_UNBILLED : The ad account whose Payment Method is Automatic Payment has unbilled cost.

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.
